page.title: 10Recreation, Children's Games
page.content: Eggy Peggy is a game for players and a caller. The players shout Eggy Peggy lost a leggy, caused by what? The caller chooses a player to decide with him a group name e.g. animals. The player goes back and tells the others to choose a member of the group each. The caller now shouts the name of a member of the group e.g. lion and the player who had chosen lion is now the caller. Piggyback Attack: at least 4 people can play. The rider tries to unseat his opponent. It's good fun if 1O people play. In French Elastic a loop of elastic is stretched around two people's legs. The player jumps in and out or over the two bands of elastic to a rhythm. When the tricks are completed the elastic moves up to the knees then thighs and the exercise is repeated.
